v.0.2.0.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lonesurv1vor/CavesOfQudArchipelagoRandomizer/compare/v0.1.0...v.0.2.0

* Add option to show or not show popups when receiving items or traps
* Delay certain items (e.g. traps) when on the world map
* Add option to delay received traps not only on the world map, but also
  in settlements (off by default)
* Store delayed traps persitently, so they aren't lost when saving and
  quitting on the world map or in settlements
* Fix serialization to not use legacy binary format
* Improve the connection and providing connection info process
  * If the connection to the server fails, one now gets prompted again
    until it works or the player aborts. This makes it more unlikely to
    lose a freshly created character on connection problems. Note that
    the game will still freeze when aborting connection on new game
    (not on loading).
  * The game now only asks for connection info on a new game and again
    when connecting failed or the room seed changed. If the last attempt
    was successful, it reuses the old data. This makes reloading ingame
    more convenient as there is still a (hard to get rid of) reconnect
    on restoring the game to a previous state.
* Various fixes and code structure changes
* First try of getting a bit of structure / balance into the item placement (WIP)
v.0.2.0.title: v.0.2.0

v0.3.0.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lonesurv1vor/CavesOfQudArchipelagoRandomizer/compare/v.0.2.0...v0.3.0

* Use regions to define progression through main quest, also tie stat item progress to it
  * Use connected regions to define accessibility, dependend on main quest steps
  * Main quest steps now need unlock item and a certain number of stat ups to be in logic
  * Side quests are still completely out of logic. WIP!
* Remove max_level setting - instead it now depends on the goal chosen
* Increase minimum locations_per_level setting to 4
* Add quick and dirty fetch item checks. Talk to Argyve to deliver the items (and check what you need). These are currently completely out of logic. WIP!
* Add world repo as a submodule
  * Use the world repos json static items and location tables
* Improve the grenade traps, making them more impactful
* Add release workflow
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

v0.3.2.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lonesurv1vor/CavesOfQudArchipelagoRandomizer/compare/v0.3.1...v0.3.2

* Fix bad paths to the multiclient dll and other internal locations.

Note: It is important that the mod folder from within the zip file is not renamed and is put as it is in `Mods`.
v0.3.2.title: v0.3.2

v0.3.3.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lonesurv1vor/CavesOfQudArchipelagoRandomizer/compare/v0.3.2...v0.3.3

Improved the delivery items checks: They should work properly now. They can now be delivered to Argyve or the Grit Gate intercom.
They are still unbalanced and out of logic.
v0.3.3.title: v0.3.3

v0.4.1.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lonesurv1vor/CavesOfQudArchipelagoRandomizer/compare/v0.3.3...v0.4.1

* Added/Improved progression logic: Progression is now bound to the players level and the main quests. The item placement should be much better now and the APWorld should now respect overall multiworld progress. No more early required items behind lategame checks or deadlocks. In general, the generator should now respect higher level locations as well as later main quest steps being locked behind earlier progress. Note that at least in case of levels, all progress is "soft blocked" - nothing prevents the player from power levelling without receiving stat up items from other worlds, it just gets harder and harder as they progress ahead of logic. But that is just the nature of the game, and I think it's fine. The only hard blocks are coming from main quests needing unlock items.
* Filler inventory items are now randomly chosen from the games population tables. You can now retrieve anything, from garbage to high tier gear (instead of just the couple of placeholder items from before). This comes with the price that the AP location names are not indicating which ingame item has been received anymore.
* Traps now include a couple of creature party spawns. Like the grenade traps, these are completely random (from a chosen set) and might be very dangerous, so you might have to run away at times.
* Updated the [README](https://github.com/lonesurv1vor/CavesOfQudArchipelagoRandomizer/README.md) (please read!)
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1

v0.5.0.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lonesurv1vor/CavesOfQudArchipelagoRandomizer/compare/v0.4.1...v0.5.0

* Traps no longer retrigger on loading an earlier game state or starting a new character by default. Added an ingame option to change that. Uses the server side data store to keep track independent of the savegame.
* Added death link. Currently only configurable via ingame option, can be changed any time.
* Added ingame option to show debug output or not.
v0.5.0.title: v0.5.0

v0.6.0.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lonesurv1vor/CavesOfQudArchipelagoRandomizer/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

* Add "The earl of Omonporch" and "A Call to Arms" as final goal options. These quests steps are currently unlocked although unlock items can be received.
* Replace "Fetch Argyve a Knickknack" goal with "Weirdwire conduit... Eureka"
* Reduce default extra levels beyond final quest to 5
* Slightly modify the quest steps levels to be closer to the games recommendation
* Fix traps not marked as traps
* Make traps a bit more dangerous
v0.6.0.title: v0.6.0

v0.7.0.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lonesurv1vor/CavesOfQudArchipelagoRandomizer/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0

* Fix world generation
  * Reimplement `create_item()`
  * Add victory event to the chosen goal and use that for the completion condition. Fixes completion logic.
v0.7.0.title: v0.7.0
